description: This file implements a Firebase-based notification service with functions to send, mark as read, delete, and subscribe to notifications for users.

methods.name: sendNotification
methods.description: Sends a notification to a specific user by creating a new notification entry in Firebase Realtime Database.

methods.name: markNotificationAsRead
methods.description: Marks a specific notification as read for a user.

methods.name: markAllNotificationsAsRead
methods.description: Marks all notifications as read for a user by updating their 'read' status.

methods.name: deleteNotification
methods.description: Deletes a specific notification for a user.

methods.name: subscribeToNotifications
methods.description: Subscribes to real-time updates of notifications for a user, providing a callback with sorted notifications.
